# MTKModelError

**Structure**

Constants used to declare Model Errors.

## Declaration

```swift
struct MTKModelError
```

## Initializing a Raw Constant

- **init(rawValue:)**

## Finding Model Error Constants

- **domain**: The error domain used by MetalKit when returning mesh initialization errors.
- **key**: The key used to retrieve an error string from an error object’s [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Foundation/NSError/userInfo] dictionary.

## Conforms To

- Equatable
- Hashable
- RawRepresentable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
